ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] What now?
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 23, my favorite location for both loot and exp was the Ruins of Cazic in the Ferrott.  At your level, you could get groups in the courtyard , maze ,
ygData.messageBody:
At level 23, my favorite location for both loot and exp was the Ruins of
Cazic in the Ferrott. At your level, you could get groups in "the
courtyard", "maze", "pit", or maybe the "TR1" (short for Throne Room 1). As
you progress in levels, you can move to other sections of Cazic like TR2,
the "Steel Golem pool", and "the temple". I was in Cazic til about level
32-33 having a great time, making good money from Fine Steel drops and plat.
Ravenscale(which is tradeable) drops in several locations.

I'd highly recommend it as a great place to level, accumulate wealth, and
learn the higher level dungeon survival tatics (like dodging trains in the
courtyard =) )

Anyway, good luck with your quest!

Thoren the Stout
Dwarven Warrior of the Rathe
The Norrath Adventuring Co.

----- Original Message -----
From: Sinarya L'achesis <selene1212@...>
To: <warriors_eq@...>
Sent: Friday, November 10, 2000 6:24 AM
Subject: [warriors_eq] What now?


> Hi. I've more or less soloed my warrior up until
> now (23rd level) and I feel a little stumped as
> to what to do next. I can only play for an hour
> or 2 at night, so it's really difficult to find
> regular people to group with right now. Do any of
> you know a half way decent place that I can
> either solo at this level or an easy dungeon to
> get into a group? Keep in mind, I am Teir'dal, so
> faction is an issue to a certain degree...
> Obviously I'm most interested in spots good for
> xp & loot, but I'll take what I can get. Any
> help will be appreciated... Thanx! =)
>

> EQ-Warrior list???
